text: He muminasakala! Tomaloke nicagrasta arasthata mukherae yi koraa seya nubujalaike chalatara nikatararti nahaba, arau junubi (aparaitra) arasthato nahaya yetiyalaike tomaloke guchala nakaraa, kintu muchaphira haâ€™le seya sukiya katha; arau yadi tomaloke asustha horaa athaba bhramanata thaka na'iba tomalokara konoba'i saucasthanara paraa ahi athaba tomaloke narai sambhoga karaara pichata pani noporaa tente paraitra matira dbaraa tayam'muma karaa, eteke tomaloke nijara mukhamandala arau hata macheha karaa; niscaya allaha papa mocanakarai, ksamasila
